triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon large-scale language models as foundational technology for conversational agents.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the underlying discipline enabling conversational agents to understand and generate natural language responses.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Chatbots and conversational agents are the primary technology analyzed in the paper for alignment with human values.

triples.name: AI alignment
triples.relevance: The paper proposes novel approaches to align conversational agents with human values and norms of discourse.

triples.name: Ethics of artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper addresses ethical considerations and social implications of conversational AI systems.
